title: What are some 'new' bands that still play rock and roll? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot that play some brand of “Rock & Roll” but for blazing hard rock these guys have been around awhile but the last 2 albums are like they made a deal with the devil they are so good, their previous works was good but these last 2 are out of the park! Eclipse, the whole album is this good :)
